alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Knox; Marshall; Peoria; Stark (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 2:28PM CST until March 07 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to three inches and flat ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Knox, Stark, Marshall, northern Fulton, and northern Peoria Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Low predictability remains, making this a boom or bust winter weather forecast. Be sure to monitor the forecast closely this evening for updates.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com
